Title: Thunder vs. Heat live stream info, TV channel: How to watch NBA on TV, stream online
Description: The Miami Heat will take on the Oklahoma City Thunder at 9 p.m. ET Monday at Chesapeake Energy Arena. Both teams seek to continue their momentum from their previous wins. It was a close one, but this past Saturday Miami sidestepped the Los Angeles Lakers for a 96-94 win.
